content.raw: I think this won't be unique to the plot plugin, several plugins will need multiple files and I think it looks cleaner to put them in their own folder. The only thing I'd suggest is that we try to make the building blocks as reusable as possible, for example, `EditableLabel`  doesn't need to be exclusive to plotting.
content.html: I think this won't be unique to the plot plugin, several plugins will need multiple files and I think it looks cleaner to put them in their own folder. The only thing I'd suggest is that we try to make the building blocks as reusable as possible, for example, EditableLabel doesn't need to be exclusive to plotting.
